description: Run a script file by name or extension, with optional arguments.
Run a script from the current script's relative path (nested script support).
Execute the current SQL buffer contents.

name: ACCEPT
description: Prompt for user input and store it in a variable (supports HIDE for passwords).

name: APPEND
description: Append text to the end of the current line in the SQL buffer.

name: ARCHIVE LOG
description: Archive redo logs (requires DBA privileges).

name: ATTRIBUTE
description: Set PL/SQL object attributes.

name: BREAK
description: Define break formatting for report groups.

name: BTITLE
description: Set the report bottom title or turn it off.

name: CHANGE
description: Change text in the current line using a substitution pattern.

name: CLEAR
description: Clear buffers, screen, timing, or formatting settings.

name: COLUMN
description: Set output column formatting such as FORMAT or HEADING.

name: COMPUTE
description: Compute aggregates per BREAK group (AVG, COUNT, MAX, MIN, SUM, etc.).

name: CONNECT
description: Connect to a database using credentials or OS authentication with optional role.

name: DEFINE
description: Define or show substitution variables.

name: DEL
description: Delete specified lines from the SQL buffer.

name: DESCRIBE
description: Display the structure of a table, view, or procedure.

name: DISCONNECT
description: Disconnect from the database while keeping the session open.

name: EDIT
description: Edit the buffer or a file using an external editor.

name: EXECUTE
description: Run a single PL/SQL statement.

name: EXIT
description: Exit SQL*Plus with optional COMMIT or ROLLBACK.

name: GET
description: Load a file into the SQL buffer.

name: HELP
description: Show SQL*Plus command help or index.

name: HOST
description: Execute an operating system command.

name: INPUT
description: Insert a new line after the current line in the SQL buffer.

name: LIST
description: List the contents of the SQL buffer.

name: PAUSE
description: Pause execution after displaying a message.

name: PRINT
description: Display the value of a bind variable.

name: PROMPT
description: Display a message on the screen.

name: RECOVER
description: Recover the database or datafiles (requires DBA privileges).

name: REMARK
description: Add a comment line that is ignored during execution.

name: REPFOOTER
description: Define report footer formatting.

name: REPHEADER
description: Define report header formatting.

name: RUN
description: List and execute the SQL buffer contents.

name: SAVE
description: Save the SQL buffer to a file (CREATE/REPLACE/APPEND).

name: SET
description: Change SQL*Plus environment settings such as PAGESIZE, LINESIZE, or TIMING.

name: SHOW
description: Show current settings, errors, or user information.

name: SHUTDOWN
description: Shut down the database instance (requires DBA privileges).

name: SPOOL
description: Write output to a file or stop spooling.

name: STARTUP
description: Start up the database instance (requires DBA privileges).

name: STORE
description: Store current settings in a script file.

name: TIMING
description: Measure elapsed time for commands (START/STOP/SHOW).

name: TTITLE
description: Set the report top title or turn it off.

name: UNDEFINE
description: Remove a previously defined variable.

name: VARIABLE
description: Declare a bind variable (NUMBER, CHAR, VARCHAR2, REFCURSOR, etc.).

name: WHENEVER
description: Specify action on SQLERROR or OSERROR (EXIT/CONTINUE with COMMIT/ROLLBACK).
